lyrics:
5 contributorsby the way lyricsverse 1
in the winding down hours
i let your heart down again
what’d i do to make a scene so gory
i’m no better than the ones before me
old habits die hard
i always end up hating the end
what’d i do to make a scene so gory
i’m no better than the ones before me

refrain
i’m in the middle of a breakdown
watching you scream
in the middle of a breakdown
screaming at me

chorus
and by the way
by the way
what made you think you’d have it your way
and by the way
by the way
don’t say i didn’t warn you
that i’ll always stay the same

verse 2
speechless and frozen
uncomfortable silence again
what’d i do to make a scene so gory
i’m no better than the ones before me
see hinder liveget tickets as low as 63you might also likerefrain
i’m in the middle of a breakdown
watching you scream
in the middle of a breakdown
screaming at me

chorus
and by the way
by the way
what made you think you’d have it your way
and by the way
by the way
don’t say i didn’t warn you
that i’ll always stay the same

bridge
battered and bruised
broken confused
it’s time we both knew
can’t stop what i started
this time we both lose
lose

chorusoutro
and by the way
by the way
what made you think you’d have it your way
and by the way
by the way
don’t say i didn’t warn you
that i’ll always stay the same
the same the same
i’ll always stay the same
battered and bruised
the same broken confused the same
i didn’t warn you that i’ll always stay the same3embed
